Address.value: 30699 RUSSELL RANCH ROAD,SUITE 295, WESTLAKE VILLAGE, California, 91362, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Velocity Financial Inc is a United States-based real estate finance company. The company primarily originates and manages investor loans secured by 1-4 unit residential rental and small commercial properties. The company earns revenue in the form of interest income. It operates in New York, California, Florida, New Jersey, and other states.
